results.definition: value measured by what must be given or done or undergone to obtain something
examples: the cost in human life was enormous

results.definition: the property of having material worth (often indicated by the amount of money something would bring if sold)
examples: he couldn't calculate the cost of the collection

results.definition: require to lose, suffer, or sacrifice
examples: This mistake cost him his job

results.definition: the total spent for goods or services including money and time and labor
